description.value:
Basic Attack

At-Will âœ¦ Poison

Standard

Reach 2

+15 vs AC; 1d8+6 damage, and the target takes ongoing 5 poison damage (save ends).

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 2

+15 vs AC; 1d6+6 damage.

Recharge 5-6

Standard

Razcoreth flies up to 10 squares and makes a bite attack at any point during the move without provoking an opportunity attack from the target.

At-Will

Immediate Reaction, If An Adjacent Enemy Does Not Move On Its Turn, At-Will

+13 vs Reflex; 1d8+6 damage, and the target is knocked prone.

Daily âœ¦ Cold, Implement

Standard

Ranged 10

Sustain Minor

+13 vs Fortitude; 2d8+6 cold damage. Hit or Miss: If the target moves for any reason, it takes 1d8 cold damage (save ends). If the target saves, Razcoreth can't sustain this power. Sustain: The target takes 2d8 damage.

At-Will âœ¦ Arcane, Charm, Implement, Psychic

Standard

Ranged 10

+13 vs Will; 1d6+6 psychic damage, and Razcoreth is invisible to the target until the start of his next turn.

At-Will âœ¦ Charm, Gaze

Minor 1/Round, At-Will

Ranged 10

+13 vs Will; the target slides 2 squares.

Encounter âœ¦ Illusion, Implement, Psychic

Standard

Ranged 10

+13 vs Will; 2d6+6 psychic damage, and Razcoreth and all his allies in range are invisible to the target until the end of Razcoreth's next turn and Razcoreth gains a +2 bonus to Stealth checks until the end of the encounter.

Recharge 5-6 âœ¦ Poison

Standard

Close blast 5

+13 vs Fortitude; 1d10+6 poison damage, and the target takes ongoing 5 poison damage and is slowed (save ends both). Aftereffect: The target is slowed (save ends).

Encounter âœ¦ Poison

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

The dragon's breath weapon recharges, and the dragon uses it immediately.

Encounter âœ¦ Fear

Standard

Close burst 5

Targets enemies; +13 vs Will; the target is stunned until the end of the dragon's next turn. Aftereffect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).

At-Will

Minor

Razcoreth can place a curse on the enemy closest to him and gain a +1 power bonus to AC until the start of his next turn. The curse lasts until the end of the encounter or until the enemy is slain. Any time Razcoreth damages a cursed target, he deals 1d6 extra damage. Whenever he reduces a cursed enemy to 0 hit points, he can teleport up to 3 squares as a free action.

Daily âœ¦ Teleportation

Move

Razcoreth can teleport up to 6 squares. He does not need line of sight to the destination, but if he attempts to teleport to a space he can't occupy, he doesn't move.

Resist 15 poison 		Init +12 | AP 2 | Save +5
AC 26Fort 24Ref 25Will 24
Speed 8, fly 10 (hover), overland flight 15
Ability ScoresStr 17 (+8)
Con 19 (+9)		Dex 20 (+10)

Cha 19 (+9)
Languages Common, Draconic
Alignment Evil
Skills Arcana +12, Bluff +19, Diplomacy +14, Insight +13, Intimidate +14, Thievery +15Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 18 | Insight 23

Equipment rod of dark reward +3 .
